item.title: FullCICS Session: Unpacking the Unpredictable with Bastián González Bustamante
item.description: On October 9th we will have a FullCICS discussion session open to the entire community, organized by PoliCICS. On this occasion, we will have an international guest from Leiden University. Bastián González Bustamante will present his work ‘Unpacking the Unpredictable: From Machine Learning to Generative AI for Detecting Crises in Presidential Democracies’, hosted at OBPEX: https://obpex.com/enlace-udp. Here are the details of the presentation: “The study expands on the data collection from my PhD at the University of Oxford (methodological article: https://doi.
